text: Lewinella nigricans is a bacterium from the genus of Lewinella which has been isolated from beach sand near Lagos in Nigeria. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Lewinella nigricans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia Category:Bacteria described in 1970
title: Lewinella nigricans
